p:
The dilution of a test serum sample required to induce 50% neutralization of a known titration of RSV A2 virus was determined using the Spearman Karber method
9 . In addition, a panel of control samples from BEI Resources (BEI RSV Reference panel catalogue #NR-32832) was included in each batch of the PRNT assay to monitor reproducibility of the assay results and deterioration of the antibodies used. Results obtained from screening of the BEI samples were compared with PRNT values of the samples as previously tested in BEI resources laboratories.
